Dear Friends and Colleagues,

With much delight, I would like to share with you an exciting news that in the Institution of Civil Engineers People’s Choice Award 2019, the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge (HZMB) Hong Kong Section project has been shortlisted as one of the ten finalists putting to public voting worldwide for the Award. The HZMB Hong Kong Section project is the only Asia project on the shortlist.

I appeal to your support by casting a vote for the Hong Kong project. Voting is conducted online from now until 27 September 2019 (Friday) 24:00 Hong Kong time. Simply click the following link and cast your vote. Every voter has the chance to win an Amazon Echo Dot.

www.ice.org.uk/peopleschoice

Please also help spread the message to your colleagues, families and friends encouraging them to vote for the Hong Kong Project to promote the strength of Hong Kong in infrastructure development. You may send the following short message to them through social media like WhatsApp, WeChat, Facebook and Instagram.

支持「港珠澳大橋香港段」 成為英國土木工程師學會2019年度最喜愛的工程項目，請立即到以下網站投票：www.ice.org.uk/peopleschoice 投票將於9月27日結束。

Please vote for Hong Kong's Project "The Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge (HZMB) Hong Kong Section" in the Institution of Civil Engineers People's Choice Award 2019. Click on this link to vote online now : www.ice.org.uk/peopleschoice. Voting will end on 27 September.


The 55 kilometer long HZMB is the longest bridge-cum-tunnel sea crossing in the world. The Hong Kong Section comprises the 12 kilometer long Hong Kong Link Road and the Hong Kong Port. With commissioning of the HZMB on 28 October 2018, it now only takes 40 minutes to travel from Hong Kong to Zhuhai and Macao. You can find further information about the HZMB Hong Kong Section on the website of Highways Department at www.hyd.gov.hk/en/road_and_railway/hzmb_projects.

Thank you for your support !

Regards,

Jimmy Chan
Director of Highways
